/usr/bin/g++  -Wall -Werror -fsanitize-address-use-after-scope CMakeFiles/alloctest.dir/tests/alloctest.cc.o CMakeFiles/alloctest.dir/tests/test_mark.cc.o CMakeFiles/alloctest.dir/tests/test_generic.cc.o CMakeFiles/alloctest.dir/tests/test_buddy.cc.o CMakeFiles/alloctest.dir/tests/test_run_cpp.cc.o -o alloctest  -Wl,-rpath,/home/anass/Documents/studies/2a/sepc/sepc1/ensimag-malloc-master/build -lgtest -lgtest_main libensimalloc.so
